name: Mobile Sites Certification @ Popcorn Studio
description:
Are you web developer and want to get certified by Google?

Mobile Sites certification is a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate understanding in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development.

HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE? - About 3-4 hours to complete. There will be 2-3 hours of study and preparation material with presentations from developers who have already completed this certification. And then 1 hour for the certification test!

STUDY TOPICS? - The study guide (and event) of this Mobile Sites certification is divided into the following sections:

- Mobile sites and why they matter
- Improving mobile site speed
- Creating an effective mobile UX
- Advanced web technologies

WHAT TO BRING? - You need to bring your own laptop and must have a Google (Gmail) account.

See you at the event on Thursday!
how_to_find_us: Come inside from the Karachi Nihari entrance to see the orange Popcorn Studio board.

description:
NOTE: This event is ONLY for Plan 9, PlanX and TechHub Connect members!

name: AdMob Connect @ Game Summit
description:
NOTE: This is an invite-only event.

Gaming app developers bring high quality, artistic, and innovative content to millions of users and raise the bar for all app developers in the process. Pakistan, in particular, has a vibrant gaming app developer ecosystem and, at Google, we want to help these developers succeed.

Join us in this invitation only event to learn latest tips and best practices about how to take your app business to the next level. It is also your chance to come together with Google, Telenor Industry experts and with fellow app developers to ask questions, give feedback, share, collaborate, and be inspired.

Event by Telenor and Google!

name: Urdu Google Play Academy Live + Q&A: Google Play Store Policies
description:
REGISTRATION FORM: http://bit.ly/2Bwj4jh (REQUIRED!)

Do you have questions about how to stay compliant with Google Play policies? Join the very first Urdu Play Academy Live by Google to get a deep-dive on top policy issues and latest updates in under 30 min.

Topics include Malicious Behaviour, User Data and Permissions, and Policy Coverage updates.
how_to_find_us: Come inside from the Karachi Nihari entrance to see the orange Popcorn Studio board.

name: Urdu Google Play Academy Live + Q&A: Google Play Store Policies

name: Introduction to React

venue.name: University of the Punjab
venue.address_1: 234-A Khayaban-e-Jamia Punjab, Punjab University New Campus

description:
Join us at the e-Rozgaar Lab University of the Punjab for an Introduction Session about React.

Agenda:
- About the speaker
- Shape of web today
- How it will be in few years
- What are web components
- What is React
- How react comes into play, Why React
- Simple hello world application in React

About the speaker: Usman Tahir is a software developer with 5 years of experience in designing multiple mid-to-large scale products. He has worked in several product-based companies as the main lead. He has a good grasp of the following technical aspects: Software Product Design; Planning and Architecture Specifically for front-end and middle-ware projects; Software Planning & Testing.
how_to_find_us: This event will be held at E-Rozgaar Lab, IER Department

name: IoT Cloud Study Jam 2019 (E-Rozgaar)
description:
Want to get started on the Internet of Things (IoT) on Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

++ REGISTRATION: This event is only for E-Rozgaar Program students.

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs on the introduction of IoT where you will get hands-on experience.

Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want.

NOTE: This is an introductory lab session for beginners. Any experience with other cloud platforms will be a plus, but not required.

-------------------
++ REGISTRATION: This event is only for E-Rozgaar Program students.
-------------------

-------------------
++ FOR DEVS:
-------------------

As a developer in the Study Jam, you will be getting:
- Free access to IoT related labs for home on Qwiklabs (worth $55)
- Online badge from Google / Qwiklabs on completion of labs
- Hands-on experience with Google Cloud Platform

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! All attendees will be required to complete the lab on their computers. The labs will run on all latest versions of the popular browsers i.e. Firefox, Chrome. Don’t forget your charger!

-------------------
++ AGENDA:
-------------------

8:45am - Registration and welcome
9:00am - Lab 1: Internet of Things: Qwik Start
10:00am - Lab 2: Streaming IoT Data to Google Cloud Storage

Event partners and supporting organizations: E-Rozgaar, Google

Follow GDG Lahore:

-- Facebook: http://bit.ly/GDGLahoreFB
-- Twitter: http://bit.ly/GDGLahoreTwitter
-- Meetup: http://bit.ly/GDGLahoreMeetup

We look forward to meeting everyone at the event!

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit - Viewing Party
description:
++ REGISTRATION: http://bit.ly/2Ncr9hx

Are you a Machine Learning enthusiast and want to know what Google has next in store for their TensorFlow library? If yes, fill out the registration form above and join us on 6th March for this live viewing event.

We are hosting a live viewing party of the TensorFlow Dev Summit 2019 keynote here in Lahore. This is to bring our local developer community together to learn about the launches taking place at the TensorFlow Summit, and encourage further participation in the TensorFlow community!

TensorFlow Dev Summit hosts a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for two days of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.

-------------------
++ REGISTRATION: http://bit.ly/2Ncr9hx
-------------------

NOTE: This is a free event, but registration is MANDATORY for attendees.

-------------------
++ AGENDA
-------------------

10:00pm - Registration
10:15pm - Welcome note - Haris Nadeem / Arbisoft
10:30pm - Live keynote on YouTube
11:30pm - Snacks and networking
12:00am - Ending note

Event partners and supporting organizations: Arbisoft

Follow GDG Lahore:

-- Facebook: http://bit.ly/GDGLahoreFB
-- Twitter: http://bit.ly/GDGLahoreTwitter
-- Meetup: http://bit.ly/GDGLahoreMeetup

We look forward to meeting everyone at the event!
